languages.text: "Аребенниан в Комморре... В движение пришли великие силы, раз Темный город посетил страшнейший из Арлекинов".
"An Arebennian in Commorragh... Great forces have been set in motion — nothing else would draw the most fearsome of all Harlequins to the Dark City."
languages.original_text: "Аребенниан в Комморре... В движение пришли великие силы, раз Темный город посетил страшнейший из Арлекинов".

traits.locale_text: "An Arebennian in Commorragh... Great forces have been set in motion — nothing else would draw the most fearsome of all Harlequins to the Dark City."
"An Arebennian in Commorragh... Great forces have been set in motion — nothing else would draw the most fearsome of all Harlequins to the Dark City."
"An Arebennian in Commorragh... Great forces have been set in motion — nothing else would draw the most fearsome of all Harlequins to the Dark City."
"An Arebennian in Commorragh... Great forces have been set in motion — nothing else would draw the most fearsome of all Harlequins to the Dark City."

languages.text: “独角出现在科摩罗……这意味有，某种非常强大的势力已经采取行动了。除了这种可能性外，没有任何东西能把丑角之中最为可怕的成员吸引到黑暗之城。”
languages.original_text: "An Arebennian in Commorragh... Great forces have been set in motion — nothing else would draw the most fearsome of all Harlequins to the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: “独角出现在科摩罗……这意味有，某种非常强大的势力已经采取行动了。除了这种可能性外，没有任何东西能把丑角之中最为可怕的成员吸引到黑暗之城。”

languages.text: « Un Arebennian sur Commorragh... Les enjeux doivent être bien plus importants que nous ne le pensions... Sinon, jamais le plus terrifiant des Arlequins n'aurait quitté la Cité Crépusculaire. »
languages.original_text: "An Arebennian in Commorragh... Great forces have been set in motion — nothing else would draw the most fearsome of all Harlequins to the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: « Un arebennian sur Commorragh... Les enjeux doivent être bien plus importants que nous ne le pensions... Sinon, jamais le plus terrifiant des arlequins n'aurait quitté la Cité Crépusculaire. »

languages.text: «Un Arebennian en Commorragh... Hay fuerzas muy poderosas en marcha. Solo eso haría que los más temibles Arlequines vinieran a la Ciudad Siniestra».
languages.original_text: "An Arebennian in Commorragh... Great forces have been set in motion — nothing else would draw the most fearsome of all Harlequins to the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: «Un Arebennian en Commorragh... Hay fuerzas muy poderosas en marcha. Solo eso haría que los más temibles Arlequines vinieran a la Ciudad Siniestra».

languages.text: 「コモラフのアーベニアンか…大きな力が動き出した――仄暗き都にいるどんなハーレクィンよりも恐ろしい存在は、奴をおいて他にない」
languages.original_text: "An Arebennian in Commorragh... Great forces have been set in motion — nothing else would draw the most fearsome of all Harlequins to the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: 「コモラフのアーベニアンか…大きな力が動き出した――仄暗き都にいるどんなハーレクィンよりも恐ろしい存在は、奴をおいて他にない」

languages.text: "Ein Arebennian in Commorragh ... Große Kräfte wurden in Gang gesetzt. Nichts sonst würde den furchterregendsten aller Harlekine in die Dunkle Stadt locken."
languages.original_text: "An Arebennian in Commorragh... Great forces have been set in motion — nothing else would draw the most fearsome of all Harlequins to the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Arebennian in Commorragh ... Große Kräfte wurden in Gang gesetzt. Nichts sonst würde den furchterregendsten aller Harlekine in die Dunkle Stadt locken."

languages.original_text: "An Arebennian in Commorragh... Great forces have been set in motion — nothing else would draw the most fearsome of all Harlequins to the Dark City."

languages.text: "Commorragh'ta bir Arebennian... Büyük güçler harekete geçirilmiş. Arlekenlerin en korkulanını başka hiçbir şey Kara Şehir'e çekemezdi."
languages.original_text: "An Arebennian in Commorragh... Great forces have been set in motion — nothing else would draw the most fearsome of all Harlequins to the Dark City."

traits.locale_text: "Commorragh'ta bir Arebennian... Büyük güçler harekete geçirildi. Arlekenlerin en korkulanını başka hiçbir şey Kara Şehir'e çekemezdi."
